Container.Name: GameVault-Backend
Container.Overview: GameVault is an innovative gaming platform providing a self-hosted, source-available alternative to popular gaming platforms. It lets you and your friends enjoy DRM-free games stored on your file server in an organized way.
Container.Requires: 1. Please read the documentation on https://gamevau.lt/ 2. PostgreSQL 15 or higher - This container requires a database to be run separately.
